body: packageName: $1  # Required  # Name of the package to download from github
version: $2  # Required  # Version of the package to download from github
externalEndpoints: $3  # Required  # Credentials to use for external registry from GitHub
packagesDirectory: $4  # Required  # Specifies the folder in which packages are installed. If no folder is specified, packages are restored into the default system working directory.
